scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to the model and observes the outputs to infer private customer information, such as income levels and contract details.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of the deployed customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  The churn prediction model is used to identify at-risk customers for targeted retention campaigns. The model is trained on sensitive customer data, including income, transaction history, and contract details.
